short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Super Onion Boy right in your web-browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join Onion Boy right in your browser to save his friend from the terrible monster and have fun along the way.

Super Onion Boy is a 2D retro style adventure game where you have to save your friend from a bad monster. As an Onion Boy you will go through many levels, defeating enemies with superpowers and epic transformations. 

Keep an eye out for chests with magic potions to help you on your way. Your ultimate goal is to defeat all the bosses and then the final boss.

The pixel art style gives Super Onion Boy 2 a classic feel, like old school games.
The controls are easy. Use the arrow keys to move left or right. Press the spacebar to jump. You can also collect power-ups that give you special abilities to help you on your quest.
